title: Variable and Feedback Processing Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming concepts and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: A Competency-Enhancement Course for Professionals in Medical, Legal, and Technical Fields, Focusing on Variable Management and Feedback Processing for Practical Problem-Solving

learning_goals: Learners can perform variable declaration, assignment, and utilization processes in a simulation environment with 85% accuracy
Learners can diagnose error causes within two or fewer attempts by analyzing system feedback
Learners can visually represent problem-solving procedures applying feedback processing strategies in project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
